values:
ok as u can tell i'm going 2 talk about Animal Cruelty, a lot of u are like "oh w/e i don't need 2 know about that shit" SAVE IT BABY
cuz ima talk about it anyway! If u don't like it get the fuck off my livejournal!!!!

Well thank you 2 u people who still are reading this, it mean's a lot 2 me and the Animal's,
Now i would love 2 save all of them, but i can't D=. and a nuther thing i'm not saying it just people in China, but alsow people in the U.S.A, and all over people killing and eating Animal's now i know sum of u out there reading thing are like " i like meat, does that make me a killer of animal's?", No, it does not, god made it so we eat sertin animal's not cat's,dog's, etc,..
people u need 2 know that there are typ's of animal's u can and can not eat fish,pig's, and idk about cow's but i would not. God Made animal's 4 a reson, it's the circle of life, but don't push it! your not 2 eat sertin thing's...
And 4 the people who read thing and think "oh it's ok 2 eat w/e i want and it's ok 2 eat dog's and cat's", No it is not! they say dog's are man's bestfriend and the only "thing" u can trust, yes that is true, like a humanbeing it's hard 2 find sumone u trust, u may not even find that person u can trust, so what do sum people do, they talk with there pet (dog,cat, w/e) so why would u eat sumthing u trust sumthing/sumone that is your best friend. and don't think i lost it, i know a lot of people who talk with there pet's, i talked with mine, but i lost my pet... 2 Animal Cruelty, My friend waz so called "playing" with my pet, and i wint out 4 a lil bit 2 go get sumthing 2 eat 4 me and her, i com back and i seen her hiting,slapping, ect.. 2 my pet but i could not stop her in time, she said my pet waz so called "hurtting her" yea right, D= my pet would never do such a thing, my pet waz like my baby 2 me, but pls don't 4 get, pet's and human baby's are not the same people, don't dress your dog cuz that's going a lil 2 out there, but don't 4 get 2 love your dog/cat/pet!

I will b posting thing's on my myspace about this and a link 2 help support it! pls people think about what i said, there are living animal's out there dieing every day so sumone can eat, stop them...there are lot's of thing's 2 eat on the earth u don't just have 2 eat your pet's...
Thanks 4 reading this, i hope i touched u in sum way.

Love Lisa <3
P.s: Tell your pet u love them everyday <888

Well 2 day is B-Day ^////^ i'm 17 now, man i feel old, lol my mom called me saying how old she feel's xDDDDDDDDD wow lmfao but yea 2 day waz nice, it waz nice out side i got 2 lay in the grass and just lison 2 sum new music (yea i got a new mp3) i don't like ipod's that much, and i got a cool gameboy ^///^ i waz playing it all day, and i got a BIGGGGGG ASS COOKIE! it waz so cool! =D i have 2 say i had a nice time on my B-Day so i did not get a lot of thing's and like not a lot of people were there, does not matter, just as long i waz happy =D and i am! i know people love me cuz like everyone called me and sent me thing's on my myspace ^.^ so cool i loved it!

Wll other then that i had a nice time! oh and i got high on a balloon lmfao xDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD
it waz so funny @_@ but yea i have 2 say the one person that ment a lot 2 me on my B-Day is Efrain he gave me the best thing ever, a Birthday card. i know it sound's like a dum thing, but he did it himself and, it is so sweet! like he waz telling me that i should b myself and never change 4 no one! and he alsow said that he would never tell me what 2 do or how 2 do my hair. idc what anyone say's that waz the best thing i got! Efain i love u, thank you so much!

And so lesson of the day is, small thing's are better then big one's cuz it's not how big the persont it, it's what is mean's that matter's! so a small thing like a B-Day card can mean more then a fucking car or an mp3! so b thankfull in what u have, cuz u never know, u might get sumthing better!

with love -LisaTerror

well as u can see, i'm in that mood were i'm loving and that does not happy 2 everyone!
Well 2 day i waz thinking my lil sis waz going 2 die from sum shit that's going around but it's ok now ^.^ idk i cryed my eye's out 2 day cuz unlike sum people i know, i love my lil sister. she mean's so much 2 me and i would never want anything 2 happin 2 her.
well i see how it feel 2 almost lose your sis, i did not know cuz it never happind 2 me, but now i know, people who read thing might b like, oh she is so fucking full of shit or dam she does not have 2 blow it all up about it so what. yea it's a big deal when u love sumone ok! i love my sis idc what anyone has 2 say ok.i lost kimiko and now i don't want 2 hav giv her up 2, but thank god she did not have that shit, cuz i know that people who get it can die right away. and that's what got me D=
I love people and i love this world i want 2 show everyone i know and don't know how much i love them, i try everything i can 2 hav such a joy in my life just so they can b happy, never will i show when i'm said!
Try and keep what we have good and nice, cuz u never know when it's gone, love the person u hate and never hate the person u love cuz u never know when there going 2 go. Live life like there no TM and b happy with everything u do, never wish u did notdo sumthing, and alowy's put your mind on the one thing u want in life! Never wish 2 bad thing's on sumone just b happy 4 them, and wach and see sumthing batter will happin 4 u!

Love alway's [LisaTerror]

Well Happy Halloween, yea it waz kinda good but the night is not over [:<

When my grandmother sleep's i will play! O: j/k lol or am i @___@
Well it waz fun the most part! I know last night waz my dude's 1st game, and she lost...FUCKING HOE! >__O jk she know's i got mad dude love 4 her O: lol so gay =.=
ok nvm that, but yea she did oh well, u can't win them all can u >__O and like it waz fun! looooootttttt of hot girl's there @_@ (no i'm not lez >_O) lol, and 2 day waz a bitch when i got 2 school, i waz talking with sumone els and this kid come's out with this "oh, gay lez and BI people need 2 die, likeing your own sex and having sex with them is not right" and he wint off with all this BULLSHIT trying 2 act like is a so gangster! pls i got people from Bronx who fuckin love gay, lez, and BI people! love is love people i don't giv a fuck what u say!

and yea i did get in 2 a fight with him, as soon as he said w/e he had 2 say, i got right up and punched him right in the face, and my teacher did not say eneything cuz he is 4 gay people O:
a lotttt of people in my class waz so pissed at him he had 2 lev class. so it waz in a way kinda funny. And i got a meet this new kid at lunch, he is kinda cute ^.^ and we were just talking all day long and he gave me a hug and a lil kiss <.< [no lips] goodbye <3 it waz kinda cute O: so yea we are going 2 get lunch TM and go sit sum place were no one [freshmin] can bother us ^.^ he said he want's 2 get 2 know me better, and yea i did tell him i have a girlfriend, he know's his place ^.^ oh no now i sound like a tamer @_@ lol

AND AND AND my B-Day is coming up!!!!!! YAY i'm getting all new babycake's and a new ipod, and cam! oh yessss nuthing better! <3 and i hope my friend's will get me sumthing cuz i got them sumthing xDDDDDDDDD
<8888

it's a bad thing, 2 day i got 2 learn that, and thing's that happind b4 in my life, sumone that i know had passed away, now not being a bitch, but i'm not the one 2 giv a fuck inless i really love u.

This got me thinking about kimiko, If u don't know who she waz, she waz my bestfriend...and almost my lover, kimiko waz the best thing that happind 2 me in my life, she changed the way i looked at life and the way i shoed it 2 people. Not saying kimiko is everything, she has her up's and down's, but she never showed it. and that is sumthing i did not like about her. but one thing waz, she waz a true person, real, not no fake fuck or nuhing.

We were at a pool party one day, and we were walking home my friend, and 2 older man cam up 2 us and u know hitting on us w/e, i did not pay eneymind nether kimiko, cuz this kinda shit alway's happind 2 us, so we were just walking not paying eneymind, and then they wint on and it got bad 2 were me and her were running 4 are live's, (Now, not a lot of people know about this, shit my grandmother don't even know) and me and kimiko were fighting them off, and i got away but kimiko waz not so good, kimiko waz fighting them off and i waz running in trying 2 get her but, she told me 2 run and get help, so i did not want 2 stand there and screm at her, so i wint, and got help, but when i cam back, she waz laying down blood all over, and she waz dieing...i never felt so much pain in my life when i seen her like that...so i ran up 2 her and i held her in my arm's. kimiko looked into my eye's and told me "Lisa...I Love You" from then on i could not stop crying...it waz like sumone waz killing me slow inside me, and then i told her "I Love You 2 Kimiko" and we looked at each other and then she died right in my arm's...

So death, Is it good...no and yes, the reson why i don't bitch and cry everyday is bcuz kimiko told me, "Lisa when sumone die's don't feel sad or mad just think about how much better there off up there, away from all the bullshit in this life, so don't feel bad, just look up and show joy on your face and know they are looking right back at u"

Never will i 4 get every word kimiko told me in my life, we seen a lot of thing's and bin in a lot of bullshit, but i love her alway's. No one will ever Replace her in my life! If she waz still with me 2 this day, i would hold her right now and tell her I Love You

So Who ever is reading this, don't b sad or mad when sumone u know and love die's just look up and know they are looking right back at u, and b happy knowing they are waching over u.

This is kinda sad, cuz u ever get that feeling on day u will die O: i know emo topic! but i mean think about it....at my school there is this shit going on and if i tuch sumone (if they had it) i can get it, like it burn's u from the inside out, man i have never felt so bad/sad/ect about going or seeing people, just think about all the bullshit out there...having sex with people drinking out there thing...i mean com on, why would u want that... i want a good life and i have bin thinking about that 2.

idk what life hold's 4 me, but if it's nice and happy i want it more then eneything...and i hope 2 spend my life with sumone who will love me (my girlfriend) i dont think i can giv her up 2 no one...she might b the one u know ^///^

but if i get that shit in school and i die i wont have one v___v and it's so sad, cuz a lot of kidz hav died from this shit, and sumone just told me it's coming 2 my school next, i don't want to die, and i want a good life.

the world should b full of love not hate and all this shit u can get just from doing the smallest thing...sumtime's i wish i could kill all the bad thing's in life so everyone will b happy, nuthing is better then seeing a [= on sumone's face when they get up.

U know u should stop and look up into the sky one day and just see the wonderful thing we have, and take care of it! cuz we only have one earth and one life, enjoy and b smart about it, cuz life can go fast and taken away easily

well last night the cops got me v.v man this suck's ass!
But my old hoe (grandmother) waz sleeping so it waz all good, i waz out with my dude friend's and i wint in wallyworld 2 get sum vitamin water and that's were sumone called the cops on me, i did not even walk out the place and they got me, cuz like were i live people under 18, can't do out side past 11:30pm, and it waz like 12:00am lmfao oh well what u going 2 do, so i wint home, and there like "if we ever see u agean we are not going 2 let u off" ohhh i'm pissing in my skinnyjean's xD

And they thing i'm staying in O: hellz no i wint right back out 30minz b4 they told me 2 go in xD lol, so i stayed out till 3 or 4am <.< shit man i wint right 2 sleep O: and my dude's got 2 sleep over my place and wint right back home as soon as they got up, cuz i don't need my old how bitchin that i had sum of my dude's sleep over and w/e.
